parameters.name: DeviceName
parameters.description: The keyword in the DeviceName of the device that you want to query. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID. You can view the **ID** of the instance on the **Overview** page in the IoT Platform console.

>  If your instance has an ID, you must specify this parameter. Otherwise, the request fails. If no Overview page exists or no instance ID is displayed, you do not need to specify this parameter.

For more information, see [Overview](~~356505~~) of IoT instances.

parameters.name: PageId
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: 1 to 10000.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 50. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: ShareTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the sharing task.
